long_description: Slip on the the comfortable, lightweight women's Oakley Obsessed Polarized Sunglasses for all your sun-filled adventures and enjoy their bold shape, chic accents and optical performance. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses offer great durability. Black Iridium polarized lenses with a gray tint reduce glare and enhance true color perception in bright light. Lightweight, flexible nylon frames resist damaging stresses. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Nose pads and earpads are made from hydrophilic rubber that becomes tackier as you perspire, holding eyewear in place as you move. The Oakley Obsessed Polarized Sunglasses feature metal icon accents.
short_description: Slip on the the comfortable, lightweight women's Oakley Obsessed Polarized Sunglasses for all your sun-filled adventures and enjoy their bold shape, chic accents and optical performance.
